attributes.action: Start a radical overhaul of how Parliament and MP’s work, then write it all down
attributes.additional_details: Let’s keep what’s best in our system but look elsewhere for improvements. For example, Canada puts online what the PM wants from Ministers & Australia has an independent body to look at election promises. We are all held accountable in our own jobs but Ministers seem able to brush off investigations, even when there is clear evidence they have failed to deliver expensive projects. We also shouldn’t need to go to Court to interpret how Parliament should function. Let’s demand change.
attributes.background: The Brexit crisis has shown Parliament needs fixing. It has good features to keep but we the People want to see full-time MP’s paid properly by us and not external donors, an end to political knighthoods as a loyalty thank-you, ministers who can acknowledge errors and written parliamentary rules.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

There's already a petition about having a written constitution. You might like to sign this petition. You're more likely to get action on this issue if you sign and share a single petition.
